Regulation Name(s): Culture medium for antimicrobial susceptibility tests
Specimen Type(s): Isolated colonies of common, rapidly growing bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Edge Biologicals Mueller Hinton Agar culture medium for antimicrobial susceptibility disk diffusion testing of bacteria
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro antimicrobial disk diffusion susceptibility testing of isolated colonies of common, rapidly growing bacteria using the Bauer-Kirby method standardized by CLSI
